rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 07, 07G, 07PG, 11, 42, 50PG, 76, 77, 78}

description: This unit examines the interrelationship between public health and human rights. It begins be providing a overview of the development, content and application of human rights. Human rights aspects of contemporary local and international health concerns are then considered.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
